name: All Aboard Beta
description:
VR using PC Link cable only (Rift and Quest). I'll work on other platforms in later iterations.

  • Track building.
  • Train Riding.
  • Build area freeform design ability.
  • More than one hidden secret to find!

A school project for SAE institute, I will continue to iterate and improve the game over time. 

Github | Trello

BGM thanks to Bensound: www.bensound.com

Trees, rocks and Train station were purchases I made on the Unity Asset store.

All work completed in Unity, assets in use are as follows:

  • VRTP - VR Tunneling Pro.
  • Galaxybox2 Skybox (Lemon Spawn).
  • Various SFX either created in BFXR or downloaded from freesound.org. All file names show attribution and can be found publicly on my Github page.
  • Old Nightstand free from Unity Asset Store (Astral Things).
  • Train free asset from the Unity store (Maker Games Studios).
  • Same with the tablet, from Security Systems free version (Mr Andrew Chapman).
  • Speaker is from the HQ Acoustic System (Next Level 3D), another free Unity Asset store item.
